Package controllers

Class UserPanelController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AbstractController
controllers.UserPanelController
public class UserPanelController extends AbstractController
UserPanelController is the main controller class for the User Panel. It updates user view screen according to user interactions. It extends AbstractController and overrides methods of it.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      initialize method is a protected method that is called automatically when the FXML file is loaded. It sets the welcome label with "Welcome" string and user name. It displays a proper message if the account has not been approved yet.
